articles.title: Rite Aid store closure plans include at least 63 sites in US - OregonLive
articles.description: Rite-Aid operates in 49 Oregon communities. The news comes on the heels of a similar announcement in early November from CVS, which has plans to close 900 stores over the next three years as the company adjusts to shoppers’ increased online buying habits.
